revised_title: Geothermal Power: Energy Utilization and Potential in the 1970s
tldr: This article discusses the development and utilization of geothermal energy, focusing on the potential and challenges of geothermal power in the 1970s. It highlights the advantages of geothermal energy, such as its competitive costs and low environmental impact, and explores the various applications of geothermal energy, including electricity generation and industrial processes. The article also provides an overview of geothermal power plants in different countries and the ongoing research and development in this field.
